text: Hitobito (fushinjin-sha-tachi) ga kunan ni atta toki wa, yokotawari, aruiwa suwari, aruiwa tatte ite mo (don'na jotai no motode mo) ware o yobu. Daga ware ga kare-ra kara kunan o nozoku to,(marude) kare-ra o kurushimeta (izen no) fuko no tame ware o yobanakatta ka no yo ni sugoshite shimau. Ko no yo ni orokana mono wa, sono okonai o (akuma ni yotte) rippada to omowa se rareru
